channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL Confidential: Scouts, Execs Differ on Shedeur Sanders Ahead of 1st Start
item.description: Ahead of Shedeur Sanders' first NFL start, we asked a former QB, execs and scouts what to make of his situation in Cleveland.

item.title: Aaron Rodgers wrist injury concerns, Should Joe Burrow start vs. the Patriots? | FTF
item.description: Joe Burrow was a full participant in practice for the second straight time. Nick Wright, Chris Broussard, Kevin Wildes, and Greg Jennings ask if Burro...

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 12 Buzz: Texans RB Joe Mixon Out For Season; Browns Extend DE
item.description: We're tracking the latest on what's happening around the NFL heading into Week 12 of the 2025 season.

item.title: NFL Heat Index: Welcome Back, Brock Purdy, and Welcome to the NFL, Shedeur Sanders
item.description: Brock Purdy proved why he's QB1 and George Pickens is balling, while Ja'Marr Chase made a boneheaded move and Shedeur Sanders doesn't look the part of...

item.title: Chiefs’ season ‘would be on life support’ with loss, Fair to put Eagles’ struggles on Hurts? | FTF
item.description: The Kansa City Chiefs play the Indianapolis Colts on Sunday, and are currently 3rd in the AFC West. Nick Wright, Chris Broussard, and Kevin Wildes dis...

item.title: Oklahoma's anthracite alternates headline top college football uniforms for Week 13
item.description: Oklahoma will ditch their usual crimson and cream color palette for just this week, donning their anthracite "Unity" alternates against Missouri.

item.title: Eagles' kelly green, Texans' battle red uniforms top NFL Week 12 threads
item.description: It's a popular throwback leading the way in Week 12 of the NFL season.

item.title: Lakers fire Buss brothers from scouting roles

item.title: Sources: Mixon not expected to play this season
item.description: Texans running back Joe Mixon is not expected to return this season because of a foot injury, sources told ESPN.
